about_the_game:
The Christopher Redemption explores the intense and original story of Christopher (Protagonist) and his sister. The Christopher sets off to look for his sister, she was missing. Will he locate his sister, and what surprises does fate have in store for him? Explores the dark world filled with three different environments filled with well-trained enemies, combat, and the need to discover the hints to find the missing sister. Gain the resources and experience from the city to fight with enemies and survive.

KEY FEATURES


  • Christopher, sets off to look for his sister, who has gone missing. Will he locate his sister, and what surprises does fate have in store for him?
  • Explores the dark world filled with three different cities filled with well-trained enemies, combat, and the need to discover the hints to find the missing sister.
  • Gain the resources and experience from the city to fight/combat with well-trained enemies, and survive in the city.
  • Engage with the emotional journey of the brother-sister tale.
  • Single-player third person shooting.

GAMEPLAY


  • The Christopher redemption part I is a story-driven action thriller game that tells its story through exploration of the cities and animated dialogue interactions.
  • The player explores a 3D dark world and needs to discover the hints to find the missing sister. There are 3 chapters that are set in 3 cities, i.e., The city of origin (Indian Localization), Death City, and Light City.
  • Each city is filled with well-trained enemies and hints.
  • The player needs to collect the resources and gain the experience to combat with the enemies and survive, as well as discover the hints to find the missing sister. The player also needs to find a way to navigate into another city.
